txt.en: The ruins of Anatrâd have been overrun by hobgoblins. The ancient fortress is essential to the success of the dwarves.
DNT - Rúdin is in Bazanmanar in northeastern Clovengap.\n\nYou should tell Rúdin that you have defeated many of the Angmarim.
DNT - 'Excellent work, my friend! You have made it that much easier for our brethren to take back the gap!'
Anatrâd is in north-eastern Clovengap.\n\nYou should defeat hobgoblins at Anatrâd.

DNT - 'I heard Gerja asking you to explore Garânashmar. The Angmarim have squirmed their way into those once-great halls, and sully the floors upon which the line of Forstóri once trod. It would greatly help our cause if, whilst sightseeing in Garânashmar, you were to remove as many of the invaders as you are able.'
The ruins of Anatrâd have been overrun by hobgoblins.
